chat.msg: hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
Hello
hey there! i'm seeing a map with a bunch of animals and things: a twig, a tiger, a butterfly, a parrot, an elephant, a frog, a crocodile, a giraffe, a snake, and some treasure
i'm starting at the twig. so, where do we go from here?
follow the small path that is past the snake to the other island
okay, got that
i'm near the snake right now. where do we go to next, mate?
cross over the snake and there is a small path that will lead you to the other island where the girraffe is
got it, i'm crossing over the snake now
alright, i see the giraffe. wanna guide me from here?
yes, cross over the two rocks to the next island and you will see a big black rock and you will want to cross over that and walk across the alligator
when you cross the alligator let me know
ooh, that sounds risky but i'll do it. i'm crossing the rocks and moving past the big black rock
i see the alligator now. going over it
all right, mate
i've made it past the alligator. what's next on this adventure?
ok walk forward to the middle of the island and then pass the frog and circle back toward the rocks that are past the frog and then cross those to get to the next island
got ya, i'm walking towards the middle of the island now
passing the frog, heading back to the rocks
once you get to the next island, take a left and go around the trees, pass the elephant and take a right toward the log that connects to the next island
hey, i'm at the next island. taking a left and going around the trees now
now pass the elephant. and taking a right toward the log. gotcha
cross the log and walk directly forward past the big rock and the tiger and you will see another log that will take you to the last island and the end
crossing the log, walking straight past the big rock and the tiger
i'm on it, mate

chat.msg: hola, you ready?
yes
great! start by heading left, going under the wooden bench. cross the trail towards the florist stand. but don't go all the way to the stand
make a cool u-turn back towards our furry friend, the white dog. crossing the trail again. you're doing awesome!
I am sitting next to the dog
fantastic! now, let's change direction. cross over the branch, and keep heading south
you'll spot another white dog chilling by a checkered picnic mat. keep on this path, you're doing great!
ok I am past the checker board
awesome! next, keep heading west, stepping over that mat and touching the bowl of berries
savour the moment. it's a scenic route!
which log do I cross there are two of them
oh, forgot to mention, pick the north one
cross that wooden branch over the river and keep going, buddy!
do I cross the bridge
nah, avoid the bridge for now
instead, take a detour around the green bush from the right side, keeping it close until you reach the florist stand. you're doing really well!
I think I went the wrong way. I am behind the bridge in front of the flower stand
no worries! from the flower stand, turn left and move below the stand
keep going until you spot a big bridge with two people riding bicycles. don't cross the bridge though, just pass it
Ok I am behind the flower stand
perfect! now head slightly south after the bridge until you see two elderly folks on a bench
you're almost there!
I am very confused. I am on the opposide island from the old people
oops! my bad. just go a few steps south of the old folks
you'll be between them and a wooden branch. you're doing great!
ok now I am between the elderly people and the branch
awesome! keeping going, you will reach a green bush next to the end of the wooden branch
ok now what
next, squeeze between the wooden branch and the bush, heading east
keep it steady, we are almost there!

chat.msg: hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
Hi!
awesome! i'm at this tent up north on the map
there's a dog chilling by a fire to the south. where should i head first?
Ok are you in a tent
yes, i'm at the tent
should i start heading south towards the dog and the fire?
ok walk forward past the dog and take a left around the fire
okay, passing by the dog
there's a red mushroom here to my right. is that where i'm supposed to go?
once past the fire walk past the mushrooms sticking to the edge of the gras and the road
got it, walking past the mushroom now, following the edge of the grass and the road
a blue car and a blue telescope are up ahead. which one's my next stop?
once past the mushroom you will hang a sharp right iand take the curve around to the telescope
sharp right, got it
now i'm at the telescope. should i keep going south?
once you reach the telescope take a right and go around in front of it and walk forward until you reach the rocks and then the house is your destination
perfect! doing a right round the telescope now
i see those rocks and the wooden house up ahead. almost there
did you reach the house
yes, i'm here! reached the wooden house
guess this game's over. *finished*

chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
Hi! I am at the palm trees and I see a dog ahead
great! start by heading south-west under that first palm tree
turn right and you'll go past another tree. before you get to the third tree, make a sharp left and keep heading south
south to which landmark
you'll see a cute brown puppy
go left of him, then tweak your path a bit to the left, and finally turn right heading south
Ok I am to the rock below the dog
cool! now, head between that big rock on your left and smaller one on your right
you'll reach the water. easy peasy!
ok I have reached the crab is that it?
not quite! go right, staying close to that big rock and continue west, but stay in the water
ok i am between the shark and the ball
okay cool, next you're gonna make a sharp right turn away from that shark
ok
great, now head back to the land, and go between the medium rock and that multicolored ball
keep moving up
ok i am directly behind the ball on the sand
awesome! now, tweak your path slightly to the left and head towards the north-west direction
ok I now see a kayak and a tent
sweet! now head between that red tent on your left and the big speaker on your right
which one do I head toward
neatly circle around the tent and head south, but just before you touch the water, go right and slide under that red kayak

Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: The context of the conversation. Sometimes Spanish words just sound better in conversation.
